Description: Foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery pyxis or salt-cellar; wall and slight ring foot broken off; wholly glazed; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 693, no. 506, pl. 22.2.16) (wrongly cited as Gardner 959)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1650)
